quoteText:
The project has a code of conduct and strives for a welcoming community

You acknowledge that the ToS;DR project strives for a welcoming community and, therefore, you commit to comply with the Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct.
title: The service provides information about its attitude towards ethical, social or political problems or controversies
